Question 11. (a) (i) Explain how an iron pan is formed in a soil. (ii) What are the effects of an iron pan in a soil? (iii) Name the soil group in which an iron pan is most likely to form. (iv) How can an iron pan in a soil be removed? (b) Describe the method of taking soil samples for testing. (c) Describe a method to measure the pH of a soil sample. [OVER]
